channel.description:
Link TV ( http://www.linktv.org ) is an independent national network providing diverse perspectives on world and national issues, without censorship or commercials. Now available in one out of four US homes. Link TV broadcasts a compelling mix of documentaries, global and national news, the music of diverse cultures and innovative participatory programs promoting citizen action. We provide a unique platform for civic dialogue and engagement on the issues of our day. Most of Link TV's programs have never been broadcast on American television.

Watch us via satellite on DIRECTV 375 and Dish Network 9410.

Follow Link TV on Facebook and Twitter: 

http://www.facebook.com/linktv
http://www.twitter.com/linktv

Link TV is operated by Link Media, Inc., a tax-exempt charitable organization under 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code.
channel.title: Link TV
channel.keywords: "world news" "middle east" politics "current affairs" "link tv" mosaic news environment interviews
